project_description: A modern, dark-themed photography and videography studio website built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. The application showcases professional photography and videography services through a cinematic, visually-rich interface with smooth animations and responsive design.

key_features.name: Hero Section
key_features.description: Main landing section with animated background, shader effects, and call-to-action buttons

key_features.name: Portfolio Gallery
key_features.description: Interactive circular gallery and portfolio showcase with filtering and lightbox functionality

key_features.name: Services Showcase
key_features.description: Service categories display with animated cards and detailed descriptions

key_features.name: Pricing Packages
key_features.description: Pricing tiers display with feature comparison and booking functionality

key_features.name: Testimonials
key_features.description: Client testimonials with animated columns and star ratings

key_features.name: Contact Form
key_features.description: Contact form with validation, file upload, and submission handling

key_features.name: Responsive Design
key_features.description: Fully responsive design that works on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices

key_features.name: Animations
key_features.description: Smooth animations, page transitions, and interactive effects using GSAP and Framer Motion

technical_requirements.description: Website must work on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
Website must be fully responsive on mobile devices (375px+)
Page load times should be under 3 seconds on average connection
Website should meet basic accessibility standards
Website should be optimized for search engines

user_stories.story: As a potential client, I want to view the portfolio gallery so that I can see examples of the studio's work
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio gallery displays correctly with all images
Filtering by category works properly
Lightbox/modal opens when clicking on portfolio items
Gallery is responsive on all devices

user_stories.story: As a potential client, I want to see pricing packages so that I can understand what services are available and their costs
acceptance_criteria: All pricing tiers are clearly displayed
Package features are listed for each tier
Booking buttons work correctly
Pricing information is easy to understand

user_stories.story: As a potential client, I want to contact the studio so that I can inquire about services or book a session
acceptance_criteria: Contact form is easy to find and use
Form validation works correctly
Form submission provides feedback to user
Contact information is clearly displayed

user_stories.story: As a potential client, I want to read testimonials so that I can understand the quality of service
acceptance_criteria: Testimonials are clearly displayed
Client names and reviews are visible
Star ratings are displayed
Testimonials are easy to read and navigate

user_stories.story: As a potential client, I want to navigate the website easily so that I can find the information I need
acceptance_criteria: Navigation menu is clear and easy to use
All pages are accessible from navigation
Mobile navigation works properly
Page transitions are smooth

success_criteria: Website loads successfully on all target devices
Portfolio gallery displays and functions properly
Website is responsive across all screen sizes
Animations and effects enhance user experience
Website performs well with good loading times
